## EventClass

Events class

**Examples**

```javascript
let ev = new EventClass()
ev.on('listen', name => `Hello ${name}`)
ev.emit('listen', 'World')
```

### on

Adds `event` to Events system

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Event listener name
-   `callback` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** Event listener callback

### once

Adds `event` to Events system.
Removes itself after fired once

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Event listener name
-   `callback` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** Event listener callback

### off

Removes `event` from Events system

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Event listener name
-   `callback` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** Event listener callback

### emit

Emits/Fired/Trigger `event` from Events system listeners

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Event listener name
-   `arg1`  
-   `arg2`  
-   `arg3`  
-   `arg4`  

## Timeline

Tween main constructor

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)?** Default params for new tweens

**Examples**

```javascript
let tl = new Timeline({delay:200})
```

### addLabel

Add label to Timeline

**Parameters**

-   `name` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** Label name
-   `offset` **any** Label value, can be `number` and/or `string`

### add

Add tween to Timeline

**Parameters**

-   `tween` **[Tween](#tween)** Tween instance
-   `position` **position** Can be label name, number or relative number to label

### restart

See [Tween#restart](#tweenrestart)

### fromTo

See [Tween#fromTo](#tweenfromto) for more information, as it's more like a that method

**Parameters**

-   `nodes` **(NodeCollection | [Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array))** DOM Elements Collection (converted to Array)
-   `from` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Initial value
-   `to` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Target value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens

### from

See [Tween#from](#tweenfrom) for more information, as it's more like a that method

**Parameters**

-   `nodes` **(NodeCollection | [Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array))** DOM Elements Collection (converted to Array)
-   `from` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Initial value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens

### to

See [Tween#to](#tweento) for more information, as it's more like a that method

**Parameters**

-   `nodes` **(NodeCollection | [Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array))** DOM Elements Collection (converted to Array)
-   `to` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Target value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens

## Tween

Tween main constructor

**Parameters**

-   `node` **([Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) \| [Element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element))** Node Element or Tween initial object
-   `object` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)?** If Node Element is using, second argument is used for Tween initial object

**Examples**

```javascript
let tween = new Tween(myNode, {width:'100px'}).to({width:'300px'}, 2000).start()
```

### isPlaying

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.isPlaying() // returns `true` if tween in progress
```

Returns **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** Returns the tween is playing

### isStarted

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.isStarted() // returns `true` if tween in started
```

Returns **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** Returns the tween is started

### reverse

Reverses the tween state/direction

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.reverse()
```

### reversed

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.reversed() // returns `true` if tween in reversed state
```

Returns **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** Returns the tween is reversed

### pause

Pauses tween

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.pause()
```

### play

Play/Resume the tween

**Examples**

```javascript
tween.play()
```

### restart

Restarts tween from initial value

**Parameters**

-   `noDelay` **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)?** If this param is set to `true`, restarts tween without `delay`

### seek

Seek tween value by `time`

**Parameters**

-   `time` **Time** Tween update time
-   `keepPlaying` **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)?** When this param is set to `false`, tween pausing after seek

### duration

Sets tween duration

**Parameters**

-   `amount` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Duration is milliseconds

### to

Sets target value and duration

**Parameters**

-   `properties` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Target value (to value)
-   `duration` **([Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number) \| [Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object))** Duration of tween (optional, default `1000`)

### start

Start the tweening

**Parameters**

-   `time` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** setting manual time instead of Current browser timestamp

### stop

Stops the tween

### delay

Set delay of tween

**Parameters**

-   `amount` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Sets tween delay / wait duration

### repeat

Sets how times tween is repeating

**Parameters**

-   `amount`  
-   `the` **amount** times of repeat

### repeatDelay

Set delay of each repeat of tween

**Parameters**

-   `amount` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Sets tween repeat delay / repeat wait duration

### reverseDelay

Set delay of each repeat alternate of tween

**Parameters**

-   `amount` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Sets tween repeat alternate delay / repeat alternate wait duration

### yoyo

Set `yoyo` state (enables reverse in repeat)

**Parameters**

-   `state` **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** Enables alternate direction for repeat
-   `_easingReverse` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)?** Easing function in reverse direction

### easing

Set easing

**Parameters**

-   `_easingFunction` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)?** Easing function in non-reverse direction

### update

Updates initial object to target value by given `time`

**Parameters**

-   `time` **Time** Current time
-   `preserve` **[Boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)?** Prevents from removing tween from store

### fromTo

Easier way to call the Tween

**Parameters**

-   `node` **[Element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element)** DOM Element
-   `object` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Initial value
-   `to` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Target value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens (optional, default `{}`)

### to

Easier way calling constructor only applies the `to` value, useful for CSS Animation

**Parameters**

-   `node` **[Element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element)** DOM Element
-   `to` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Target value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens

### from

Easier way calling constructor only applies the `from` value, useful for CSS Animation

**Parameters**

-   `node` **[Element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element)** DOM Element
-   `from` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Initial value
-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** Options of tweens
